verses.verse: <S%H3196>Wine<s%> is a <S%H3887>mocker<s%>, strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> is <S%H1993>raging<s%>: and whoever is <S%H7686>deceived<s%> thereby is not <S%H2449>wise<s%>.
The <S%H367>fear<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is as the <S%H5099>roaring<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion<s%>: whoever provokes him to <S%H5674>anger<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> against his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
It is a <S%H3519>honor<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H7674>cease<s%> from <S%H7379>strife<s%>: but every <S%H191>fool<s%> will be <S%H1566>quarreling<s%>.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> will not <S%H2790>plow<s%> by reason of the <S%H2779>cold<s%>; therefore shall he <S%H7592>beg<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and have nothing.
<S%H6098>Counsel<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> is like <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>; but a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> will draw it <S%H1802>out<s%>.
<S%H7230>Most<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> will <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his own <S%H2617>goodness<s%>: but a <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> who can <S%H4672>find<s%>?
The <S%H6662>just<s%> man <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity<s%>: his <S%H1121>sons<s%> are <S%H835>blessed<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%>.
A <S%H4428>king<s%> that sits <S%H3427>in<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1779>judgment<s%> scatters <S%H2219>away<s%> all <S%H7451>evil<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Who can <S%H559>say<s%>, I have made my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2135>clean<s%>, I am <S%H2891>pure<s%> from my <S%H2403>sin<s%>?
Various <S%H68>weights<s%>, and various <S%H374>measures<s%>, <S%H8147>both<s%> of them are <S%H1571>alike<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Even a <S%H5288>child<s%> is <S%H5234>known<s%> by his <S%H4611>doings<s%>, whether his <S%H6467>work<s%> be <S%H2134>pure<s%>, and whether it be <S%H3477>right<s%>.
The <S%H8085>hearing<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%>, and the <S%H7200>seeing<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> even both of <S%H8147>them<s%>.
<S%H157>Love<s%> not <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, lest you come to <S%H3423>poverty<s%>; <S%H6491>open<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and you shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
It is <S%H7451>naught<s%>, it is <S%H7451>naught<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H7069>buyer<s%>: but when he is <S%H235>gone<s%> his <S%H1984>way<s%>, then he boasts.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6443>rubies<s%>: but the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> are a <S%H3366>precious<s%> <S%H3627>jewel<s%>.
<S%H3947>Take<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> that is <S%H6148>sure<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>: and take a <S%H2254>pledge<s%> of him for a strange <S%H5237>woman<s%>.
<S%H3899>Bread<s%> of <S%H8267>deceit<s%> is <S%H6156>sweet<s%> to a <S%H376>man<s%>; but <S%H310>afterwards<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2687>gravel<s%>.
Every <S%H4284>purpose<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H6098>counsel<s%>: and with good <S%H8458>advice<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%>.
He that goes <S%H1980>about<s%> as a <S%H7400>gossip<s%> <S%H1540>reveals<s%> <S%H5475>secrets<s%>: therefore <S%H6148>meddle<s%> not with him that <S%H6601>flatters<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Whoever <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%>, his <S%H5216>lamp<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%> in <S%H380>obscure<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
A <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> may be gotten <S%H926>hastily<s%> at the <S%H7223>beginning<s%>; but the <S%H319>end<s%> there shall not be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.
<S%H559>Say<s%> not <S%H7999>you<s%>, I will recompense <S%H7451>evil<s%>; but wait <S%H6960>on<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and he shall save <S%H3467>you<s%>.
Differing <S%H68>weights<s%> are a <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and a <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H3976>balance<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%>.
<S%H1397>Man<s%>'s <S%H4703>goings<s%> are of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; how can a <S%H120>man<s%> then <S%H995>understand<s%> his own <S%H1870>way<s%>?
It is a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H3216>devours<s%> that which is <S%H6944>holy<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%> to make <S%H1239>enquiry<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2219>scatters<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and <S%H7725>brings<s%> the wheel over <S%H212>them<s%>.
The <S%H5397>spirit<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is the <S%H5216>candle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H2664>searching<s%> all the inward <S%H2315>parts<s%> of the <S%H990>belly<s%>.
<S%H2617>Mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> is <S%H5582>upheld<s%> by <S%H2617>mercy<s%>.
The <S%H8597>glory<s%> of young <S%H970>men<s%> is their <S%H3581>strength<s%>: and the <S%H1926>beauty<s%> of old <S%H2205>men<s%> is the gray <S%H7872>head<s%>.
The <S%H2250>blueness<s%> of a <S%H6482>wound<s%> <S%H8562>cleanses<s%> away <S%H7451>evil<s%>: so do <S%H4347>stripes<s%> the inward <S%H2315>parts<s%> of the <S%H990>belly<s%>.
